title: Lewis and Clark National Historical Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for how to get involved at Lewis and Clark? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities.  NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in national parks.   Partners Our partner organizations receive no public funds nor are they supported by any private endowment.    Volunteer Fort Clatsop has an outstanding team of Volunteers in Parks (VIPs). VIPs assist the park with a wide variety of tasks.  Work With Us All park work opportunities, except Youth Conservation Corps, are announced on USA Jobs website. For current vacancies with the National Park Service go to www.usajobs.gov.
